job.title: 100% REMOTE Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
A risk management software company is looking for a 100% remote Site Reliability Engineer and is offering up to $65/hour (contract-to-hire). This engineer is someone experienced with either Terraform, Cloudformation, or Ansible, and skilled with at least one scripting language (Powershell, Bash, Python, etc.). Someone who be comfortable joining a major Azure cloud migration project, and looking to expand their DevOps skill set (including hands-on Kubernetes/AKS builds) will fit in perfectly here!

Required Skills & Experience
  • 3+ years of experience
  • Proficient with at least one major public cloud (Azure, AWS, or GCP)
  • Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform or Cloudformation)
  • Configuration Management (Ansible preferred)
  • Scripting (Bash, Powershell, Python, etc.)
  • Linux or Windows server support/troubleshooting
Desired Skills & Experience
  • Understanding of containerization/orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes, etc.)
  • Azure or AWS certifications
  • Blue-Green deployment methodologies
  • Monitoring (Grafana, Nagios, Prometheus)
  • On-prem to Cloud Migrations
What You Will Be Doing

Tech Breakdown
  • 70% on-premise
  • 30% Azure
  • Terraform
  • AKS
Daily Responsibilities
  • 90% Hands On
  • 10% Management Duties
The Offer
  • Competitive compensation: Up to $65/hour, (contract-to-hire)
You Will Receive The Following Benefits
  • Medical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA)
  • 401(k)
  • Paid Sick Time Leave
  • Pre-tax Commuter Benefit
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.

Posted By: Gavin Malloy
